0: Place needs to be updated and will close next April for renovation
Pool tiles need a good scrubbing
I gave up calling maintenance because they did not fix anything or would show up at 6 am

I am a early riser so can say with certainty the pool guys work tirelessly keeping these areas spic and span and i even witnessed a guy on many occasions with a scrubbing brush wearing goggles going under water scrubbing the mosaic tiles
The rooms are very dated and need updating
but rooms are very humid and they need to either renovate ir improve cleanliness
The pool is in much need of repair tiles missing in the pool in a lot of areas
The resort it ’s self needs remodeling
They are doing some remodeling in the near future
I did hear that they are redoing the hotel which might make it better
1: I stayed at the Riu Palace Punta Cana newly renovated
We stayed here last year before it was updated and revisited this year what an amazing change
The rooms are big though need to be updated
This was my first time at the Riu Palace PC and I was initially very impressed with the manicured grounds and recent renovations
The remodel has made the lobby very modern the rooms did not change much and are always clean
The resort is fully updated remodeled and is very clean
Liters of water were amply provided and refreshed as well
Recently renewed nice staff and service
You can tell this place was recently renovated

Had a 2 week holiday in riu palace great food really friendly staff Victor in the sports bar looked after us really we will kept us topped up and Ruth in piano bar looked after us as well third time at the palace first time since the refurbishment and made a great holiday special thanks riu
